MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH8 postcode area of Holywell affecting properties in Cwrt Y Glowyr and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:16am. Our engineers are on site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.45am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.53am on the 28th January 2021.
